meanings.definition: A three-wheeled vehicle, typically used by children.
meanings.sent1: Children rode colorful trikes in the park.
meanings.sent2: The daycare had a fleet of trikes for the kids to play with.
meanings.sent3: The trikes at the school race were decorated with streamers.
meanings.sent4: The trikes lined up looked like a row of colorful beetles.
meanings.sent5: The sound of laughter filled the air as the children raced on their trikes.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'trike', referring to multiple three-wheeled vehicles.
meanings.sent1: The garage was full of shiny trikes.
meanings.sent2: We saw a parade of trikes on the street.
meanings.sent3: The trikes in the store all had different designs.
meanings.sent4: The field was a sea of trikes, gleaming in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The sound of wheels spinning echoed as the trikes zoomed by.
